titleStmt.title: Strange-predictions related at Catericke in the north of England: by one who saw a vision, and told it himselfe to the company with whom he was drinking healths; how he was struck, and an angel appeared to him with a sword. A revelation made to him; and the whole narrative of the same. Certified by a letter from an eminent person.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

titleStmt.title: Strange-predictions related at Catericke in the north of England: by one who saw a vision, and told it himselfe to the company with whom he was drinking healths; how he was struck, and an angel appeared to him with a sword. A revelation made to him; and the whole narrative of the same. Certified by a letter from an eminent person.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?
P. M.

notesStmt.note: Consists of 2 letters: the first signed "L.P." [i.e. Laurence Price], the second signed "P.M.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
